name: fishmonger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who sells fish, especially from a shop
Juice Images/Cultura/GettyImages fishmonger's UK plural fishmongers
a shop that sells fish: I'll stop at the fishmonger's on my way home from work.
